trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Antioch
There were no other sightings in Antioch on or around November 2nd 2000
divs: sighting detailsi was standing in the drive way having a cigarette. the sky was\is so cleartonight i was just admiring the stars. then out of the north (heading south) isaw three lights in succesion moving across the sky. the altitude was high. arough guess would be about a mile. as the object grew closer (it was movingextremly fast relative to jet traffic)i could make out a slight bluishluminescence that created a cylindrical shape, with the three lights onside\bottom. the three lights remained the same intensity with no fluctuation. this object would have be at least 1\4 mile long. the object then bankedslightly overhead and headed east, highlighting the luminescence. i blinked myeyes to make sure that i was not having some kind of hallucination. (this seemsrather unscientific in retrospect)the object faded with the distance it wascovering into the east. i was and am stunned. i tried to call the #800 but noone was there and felt ridiculous leaving a message.if anyone else reports thisor you figure out what it was please let me know.
